SELECT auction_idx , brand_name , auction_title , auction_image1 , auction_manage_check_date
, auction_start_date , auction_start_price , auction_max_price , category_idx , auction_log_count FROM AUCTION_PREPARE_LIST
WHERE category_idx = 6
WHERE category_idx = 7
WHERE category_idx = 8
ORDER BY auction_log_count DESC
ORDER BY auction_start_price DESC
ORDER BY auction_manage_check_date DESC
LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}

WHERE category_idx = 6
WHERE category_idx = 7
WHERE category_idx = 8
ORDER BY auction_log_count DESC
ORDER BY auction_start_price DESC
ORDER BY auction_manage_check_date DESC

SELECT auction_idx , brand_name , auction_image1 , auction_title , auction_manage_check_date , IFNULL(auction_final_price, 0) AS auction_final_price , auction_final_datetime , auction_max_price , category_idx , auction_log_count , auction_apply_count , IF(auction_apply_count = 0, '낙찰실패', '낙찰') AS auction_issuccess FROM AUCTION_END_LIST
WHERE category_idx = 6
WHERE category_idx = 7
WHERE category_idx = 8
ORDER BY auction_log_count DESC
ORDER BY auction_start_price DESC
ORDER BY auction_manage_check_date DESC

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT member_id, AUCTION_IDX, COUNT(*) as count FROM AUCTION_LOG_ROOM WHERE member_id = #{member_id} GROUP BY member_id, AUCTION_LOG_IDX ) SELECT A.* FROM AUCTION_PRESENT_LIST A JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CTE WHERE count = 1 GROUP BY member_id, AUCTION_IDX ) B ON A.auction_idx = B.AUCTION_IDX;

SELECT AUCTION_LOG_ROOM.*, AUCTION_END_LIST.* FROM AUCTION_END_LIST JOIN AUCTION_LOG_ROOM ON AUCTION_LOG_ROOM.auction_idx = AUCTION_END_LIST.auction_idx WHERE AUCTION_LOG_ROOM.auction_log_bid = AUCTION_END_LIST.auction_final_price AND AUCTION_LOG_ROOM.member_id = #{member_id}
